alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Fayette (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 1:55PM CST until January 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Wintry Mix Moves In Tuesday Morning... .A wintry mix of rain, freezing rain and snow will push northward across parts of northeast Iowa and southwest Wisconsin before daybreak Tuesday. A glaze of ice could develop while snowfall up to 1" is also possible. The bulk of the precipitation will push east by the noon. Be prepared for impacts to the Tuesday morning commute. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Snow up to 1 inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...In Iowa, Fayette and Clayton Counties. In Wisconsin, Grant County. * WHEN...From 2 AM to noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Iowa, visit 511ia.org for road conditions. In Wisconsin, visit 511wi.gov for road conditions.
